headline: Boston Scientific’s (BSX) FARAPULSE Approved by FDA for Expanded Labeling
summary: Boston Scientific Corporation (NYSE:BSX) is one of the 13 Best Large Cap Stocks to Buy Right Now. On July 7, Boston Scientific Corporation (NYSE:BSX) announced that it has obtained approval to expand the instructions for use (IFU) labeling for the FARAPULSE Pulsed Field Ablation (PFA) System from the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA).
